TestCaseTitle: Verify mock API server page loads
TestSteps: Open browser and navigate to http://localhost:3001
ExpectedResult: Page loads successfully showing server running message

TestCaseTitle: Verify server running success message is displayed
TestSteps: Open homepage and observe top banner
ExpectedResult: Green success message "Mock API Server is running" is displayed

TestCaseTitle: Verify API endpoints section is visible
TestSteps: Scroll to Available API Endpoints section
ExpectedResult: All API endpoints are listed correctly

TestCaseTitle: Verify login API endpoint is listed
ExpectedResult: Login endpoint is displayed with correct method

TestCaseTitle: Verify logout API endpoint is listed
Verify ESG question submission endpoint visibility
Verify test user credentials are displayed
TestSteps: Scroll to Test User Accounts section
ExpectedResult: Analyst and Admin credentials are visible

TestCaseTitle: Verify curl login example is displayed
TestSteps: Scroll to Quick API Test section
